itemInfo.itemDesc: Extra Damage +50 on Critical Hit for 8 min.\n- Cooldown : 10 min.

item.name: Oil of Tranquility
item.desc: A Processed reagent capable of changing the form of other materials through Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: It can be refined by mixing alchemical ingredients with blood through Alchemy.

item.name: Oil of Tranquility
item.desc: A Processed reagent capable of changing the form of other materials through Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: It can be refined by mixing alchemical ingredients with blood through Alchemy.

item.name: Clear Liquid Reagent
item.desc: A Catalyst that can be applied to various Alchemy mixtures.\n- How to Obtain: It can be made using Alchemy.

item.name: Ancient Mushroom
item.desc:
A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be used as an ingredient in Alchemy and Cooking.
- How to Obtain: Ancient Mushrooms can be Gathered using Bare Hands or a Hoe.

 â€» Consuming this item without Cooking will grant a special buff, but you may be poisoned!

item.name: Trace of Death
item.desc: A material used for Crafting equipment. It can be obtained through Excavation.

item.name: Ash Sap
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained from an Ash Tree using a Fluid Collector.
